statements: DELETE FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE temperature > 30 AND region_name = 'New York'

DELETE FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM heatmap_satellite_images WHERE coordinates ST_Within(ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((-74.258 40.477, -74.258 40.917, -73.7 40.917, -73.7 40.477, -74.258 40.477))'),1) AND temperature < 20
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE region_id = 5 AND temperature_reading <= 20;
DELETE FROM temperature_data WHERE region_id = 5 AND temperature_reading < 25.0;
DELETE FROM Temperature_Data WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -100;
